title: Venda Ravioli, Inc. Recalls Meat Ravioli Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, June 8, 2018 Venda Ravioli, Inc., a Providence, R.I. establishment, is recalling approximately 672 pounds of frozen meat ravioli products that were produced without the benefit of federal inspection, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The frozen...
